data.comment: The match has started.
Gremio awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 2, Ball goes out of play for a Gremio goal kick.
Raphael Claus signals a Gremio throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 5, Gremio are pushing forward but Pepe's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto Alegre.
Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
In the minute 6, Ball safe as Gremio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Vasco da Gama to take a throw-in in Gremio territory.
Gremio have a goal kick.
In the minute 10, Can Gremio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half?
Corner awarded to Gremio.
Gremio have been awarded a corner by Raphael Claus.
In the minute 13, Gremio's David Braz attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Raphael Claus awards Vasco da Gama a goal kick.
Vasco da Gama drives forward and Leo Matos gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 14, Throw-in Gremio.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in the half of Gremio.
Throw-in high up the field for Vasco da Gama in Porto Alegre.
In the minute 19, Gremio's Cesar Pinares breaks free at Arena do Gremio. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Vasco da Gama at Arena do Gremio.
Gremio awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 23, Maicon of Gremio smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama close to the penalty box.
In the minute 28, In Porto Alegre Vasco da Gama attack through Martin Benitez. The finish is off target, however.
Gremio have a goal kick.
Gremio's Ferreira misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 30, It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto Alegre.
Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Gremio goal kick.
In the minute 32, Corner awarded to Vasco da Gama.
Raphael Claus awards Gremio a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 36, Free kick in a good position for Gremio!
Cesar Pinares of Gremio gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Vasco da Gama at Arena do Gremio.
In the minute 38, Vasco da Gama have a dangerous throw-in.
Gremio's Matheus Henrique is on target but unsuccessful.
Gremio have been awarded a corner by Raphael Claus.
Gremio have been awarded a corner by Raphael Claus.
Goal! Diego Souza heads Gremio into a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 41, That's a fine assist from Matheus Henrique.
In the minute 44, Vasco da Gama to take a throw-in in Gremio territory.
Raphael Claus signals a Vasco da Gama throw-in in Gremio's half.
Raphael Claus awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Gremio at Arena do Gremio.
In the minute 45, At Arena do Gremio the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in the half of Gremio.
Raphael Claus signals a throw-in for Vasco da Gama, close to Gremio's area.
In the minute 45, Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama.
Leo Matos for the away team is judged to be offside.
Raphael Claus blows to end the first-half.
Ricardo Sa Pinto is making the team's first substitution at Arena do Gremio with Ricardo Graca replacing Leandro Castan.
In the minute 45, The away team have replaced Marcos Junior with Juninho. This is the second substitution made today by Ricardo Sa Pinto.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
Ferreira (Gremio) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Raphael Claus awards Gremio a goal kick.
In the minute 52, Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
Goal! Gremio increase their lead to 2-0 through a well-placed header from Diego Souza.
Great play from Victor Ferraz to set up the goal.
In the minute 55, Gremio take a comfortable 3-0 lead thanks to Cesar Pinares.
Pepe with an assist there.
In the minute 58, Gremio are coming forward and Diego Souza gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Vasco da Gama goal kick.
Diego Souza is booked for the home team and will be suspended from the next match.
Lucas Silva is replacing Cesar Pinares for Gremio at Arena do Gremio.
In the minute 59, The home team replace Maicon with Darlan Mendes.
Diego Churin is replacing Diego Souza for the home team.
In the minute 61, Gremio's Pepe gets in a shot on goal at Arena do Gremio. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Leo Matos (Vasco da Gama) has received a first yellow card.
Matheus Henrique is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Throw-in for Gremio in their own half.
In the minute 64, Throw-in for Gremio at Arena do Gremio.
Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
Throw-in Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 65, Ricardo Sa Pinto (Vasco da Gama) is making a third substitution, with Carlinhos replacing Gustavo Torres.
Ribamar is on a sub for Marcelo Alves for Vasco da Gama.
Raphael Claus signals a Gremio throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half.
In the minute 67, Corner awarded to Vasco da Gama.
Gremio are pushing forward but Matheus Henrique's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Vasco da Gama at Arena do Gremio.
In the minute 68, Matheus Henrique returns to the field for Gremio after picking up a slight injury.
Vasco da Gama are in shooting range from this free kick.
In Porto Alegre Vasco da Gama drive forward through Leonardo Gil. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 72, Martin Benitez gets his shot on target but fails to score for Vasco da Gama.
Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
The home team has substituted Matheus Henrique with Thaciano. Renato Gaucho is thus making his fourth change.
In the minute 76, Corner awarded to Gremio.
Vasco da Gama needs to be cautious. Gremio have an attacking throw-in.
Ferreira for Gremio drives towards goal at Arena do Gremio. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 78, Throw-in for Gremio in the half of Vasco da Gama.
Gremio apply pressure at Arena do Gremio and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Pepe but the strike hits the bar!
It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto Alegre.
In the minute 79, Renato Gaucho (Gremio) is making a fifth substitution, with Robson replacing Pepe.
Vasco da Gama have been awarded a corner by Raphael Claus.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 82, Vasco da Gama awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Gremio capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Vasco da Gama's half?
Vasco da Gama have a goal kick.
In the minute 85, Throw-in high up the field for Vasco da Gama in Porto Alegre.
Free kick Vasco da Gama.
Ricardo Sa Pinto is making the team's fifth substitution at Arena do Gremio with Tiago Reis replacing Talles Magno.
In the minute 87, Free kick for Vasco da Gama in the half of Gremio.
Lucas Silva (Gremio) gets a yellow card.
Goal kick for Gremio at Arena do Gremio.
In the minute 89, Can Gremio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half?
Lucas Silva hits the post! Very nearly a goal there for Gremio!
Thaciano of Gremio is pulled up for offside.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Gremio have been given a penalty...
The second-half is over. The match ends 4-0.
Gremio are going well in Porto Alegre. They now lead 4-0 thanks to a Lucas Silva penalty.
